programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Nithe ar malairt iad ar a chéile a bheidh ag TomTom, Yoyo agus JJ inniu. (Join TomTom, Yoyo and JJ in learning about opposites.)

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Tá sé an-tábhachtach bricfeasta maith a ithe. Céard is féidir a ithe ar maidin? (Breakfast is the most important meal of the day! Let's sing along.)

programme.title: Digley & Dazey
programme.desc: Tá an tUasal Rubble ag iarraidh áirse mhór a dhéanamh as bloicíní daite. (Mr. Rubble has plans for a huge arch built out of coloured blocks.)

programme.title: Digley & Dazey
programme.desc: Tá an cró trí thine. Caithfidh na cairde an tine a mhúchadh. (The crew is repairing the road by Old MacDonald's Farm when the barn catches on fire!)

programme.title: Pip & Posy
programme.desc: Caithfidh tú lámh a chroitheadh ar bhealach áirithe má theastaíonn uait a bheith i gclub Frankie. (Pip can't get the special handshake right to join Frankie's club.)

programme.title: Balloon Barnyard
programme.desc: Tá an t-arbhar réidh le baint ach tá na préacháin á ithe. (The corn is ready to harvest, but the crows are eating it!)

programme.title: Clifford
programme.desc: Ligeann ár gcairde orthu féin gur muscaedóirí cróga iad. (The members of the "Birdwell Islandeers" realize they don't all agree on what it means to be a hero.)

programme.title: Elmo Anseo
programme.desc: Ag foghlaim faoi champaí samhraidh a bheidh Elmo inniu. (Elmo is learning all about summer camps today.)

programme.title: Elmo Anseo
programme.desc: Ag foghlaim faoi ghrianghrafadóirí a bheidh Elmo inniu. (Elmo is learning all about photographers today.)

programme.title: Deer Squad
programme.desc: Beireann Rammy ar ubh a thiteann as nead agus tugann sé aire di. (Rammy catches an egg from a nest and takes care of it.)

programme.title: Dinocity
programme.desc: Tá Ricky ag ligean air féin gur ubhthoradh é. (Ricky is pretending to be an aubergine.)

programme.title: Woozle & Pip
programme.desc: Baintear geit as na cairde nuair a chroitheann an talamh faoina gcosa. (The friends are frightened by mysterious underground ructions.)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Téann na PJ Masks i ndiaidh an Ninja Oíche agus na Ninjalino ar Chnoc Mistéire. (Night Ninja and the ninjalinos read the books they stole and the PJ Masks go after them.)

programme.title: Cúla4
programme.desc: Níl aon easpa cláracha do dhaoine óga ar Cúla4 - bí ag spraoi agus ag foghlaim in éineacht linn. (Younger audiences will be spoilt for choice with Cúla4 - watch, play and learn.)

programme.title: Garfield
programme.desc: Tá dlí nua curtha i bhfeidhm ag an Méara Grafton. (Corrupt Mayor Grafton has implemented a new law: everyone has to be extra nice with cats!)

programme.title: Miraculous
programme.desc: Tá Mait ag iarraidh díoltas a bhaint amach ar Naoise agus ar Marinette mar go raibh siad ag magadh faoi. (A student named Marc gets akumatized into Reverser.)

programme.title: That's Joey
programme.desc: Éiríonn comharsa béal dorais an-chrosta le Joey agus le Yassine. (Joey and Yassine set out to help Joey's neighbour Billy relax.)

programme.title: That's Joey
programme.desc: Athraíonn Joey marcanna an ranga nuair a thagann an cigire. (When an inspector comes to visit the school, Joey thinks it's a good idea to change the class grades.)

programme.title: Zak Jinks
programme.desc: Féachann Zak agus Jason le bleachtaire a dhéanamh de Bhanphrionsa. (Zak and Jason try to train Princess to become a detective.)

programme.title: Dónall Dána
programme.desc: Faigheann Dónall amach go bhfuil an-spraoi ag baint le slaitín draíochta! (Dónall is about to find out what can happen in the presence of a magic wand.)

programme.title: Angelo Rules
programme.desc: Tá Angelo agus Elena coinnithe sa mbaile go dtí go mbeidh siad mór le chéile arís. (Angelo and Elena are grounded, unless they can stop fighting.)

programme.title: Angelo Rules
programme.desc: Féachann Angelo agus Sherwood leis an bhfaitíos atá ar Lola roimh cholúir a bhaint aisti. (Angelo and Sherwood help Lola conquer her fear of pigeons.)

programme.title: Dodo
programme.desc: Tá Joe i dtrioblóid ar scoil. (Joe finds himself in big trouble at school today.)

programme.title: Timpeall na Tíre
programme.desc: Achoimre ar chuid de mhórscéalta na seachtaine mar a craoladh ar Nuacht TG4. (Some of the stories from this week's regional news as seen on Nuacht TG4.)

programme.title: Dr. Quinn Medicine Woman
programme.desc: Téann Hank ar an ól nuair a éiríonn Myra as ag obair dó. (After Myra quits working for Hank, he drinks himself into a coma.)

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Tagann deirfiúr Sophia, nár labhair léi ná nach bhfaca sí le 30 bliain, ar cuairt gan choinne. (Sophia's acerbic sister pays an unexpected visit.)

programme.title: Rúin ón Spéir
programme.desc: Fiosraítear sa chlár seo stair cheilte iarthar agus thuaisceart na tíre. (We explore the mysteries and secret histories of the West and North.)

programme.title: An Aimsir Láithreach
programme.desc: Aimsir réigiúnach agus náisiúnta. (National and regional weather.)

programme.title: GAA Beo
programme.desc: Craoladh beo ar chluiche leathcheannais i Roinn 1. Á chur i láthair ag Micheál Ó Domhnaill. (Allianz Hurling League - Live coverage of the Division 1 Semi-Final.)

programme.title: GAA Beo
programme.desc: Sraith Peile Allianz - Craoladh beo ón mbabhta deireanach i Roinn 1. (Allianz Football League - Live coverage of the final day in Division 1. Presented by Micheál Ó Domhnaill.)

programme.title: GAA Beo

programme.title: Ollchlár Ros na Rún
programme.desc: An gcoinneoidh Niall greim ar a theanga nó an ngéillfidh sé do Frankie? (Will Niall keep his lips sealed or cave and give Frankie what he wants?)

programme.title: An Ríl Deal
programme.desc: Táthar sa tóir ar an damhsóir Gaelach nó an grúpa damhsóirí Gaelacha is fearr sa tír. (The search is on for the best Irish dance act in the country!)

programme.title: Geantraí
programme.desc: Tigh Tutty, Cillín Chaoimhín, Co. Chill Mhantáin a bheidh Ciarán anocht d'oíche mhór cheoil agus scléipe. (Featuring Kevin Conneff, Joe McHugh, Michelle O'Brien and more.)
